You know what the weight loss cure is?

Exercise and healthy eating...Stupid lazy fucks.
Before you download this "fiction" see what Trudeau don't want you to know.  http://dir.salon.com/story/books/feature/2005/07/29/trudeau/index.html

Thanks so much for this upload ? 
The quality is not perfect but fine to read on the screen. The reason Kevin is made out to be such a fraud is because he speaks the truth.  Pharmaceutical, weight loss, and fast food corporations stand to loose billions if people like Kevin shows the world the fraud, rubbish operations, pills and procedures that just make us sicker and make them more money. That?s why they spend so much money on making Kevin seem like a fraud they don?t want us to know the truth which will loose them money.
If you battle to keep of the weight this is a must read !

Actually this guy is a convicted felon. Just do a quick Google and or check him out on Wikipedia and you will see. Still his books have some valid infomation which can usually be found in other sources too.
